1370: Heinone moved to Breestraat.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Iris at age 30 in 1370.
Had a son with Iris, Amilius, at age 30.
1371: Had a daughter with Iris, Aleberna, at age 31.
1372: Had a daughter with Iris, Auesoete, at age 32.
1373: Had a son with Iris, Kornillis, at age 33.
1375: Lost son Kornillis when Kornillis was 3 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Iris, Aleberna, at age 36.
1377: Became caretaker of Amilius, Aleberna, Auesoete, Aleberna at age 38.
1385: Lost daughter Aleberna when Aleberna was 10 years old.
